document.full_text: paypal, the ebay-owned online payment system, could be set for a major boost as mobile payment systems start to take off over the next year, a survey by market research firm gfk suggests.
document.title: paypal is top brand for mobile payments: gfk survey
lines_and_colors: paypal, the ebay-owned online payment system, could be set for a major boost as mobile payment systems start to take off over the next year, a survey by market research firm gfk suggests.
